title: Pius History: The Facts Behind the Pius Trilogy
description: Ever wonder about what was fact or fiction in your favorite thriller? How much was made up or how much was just to push the story along?Well, wonder no longer as Declan Finn pulls back the curtain on his epic trilogy to show you his meticulous, painstaking research. Did his fictional pope grow up in a world as rough as described? Are the bad guys really that motivated to end the church? Are some of the weapons real? Did Pius XII really take a side for or against the Nazis? This book has the answers you're looking for.
author: Declan Finn
